actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated for development of Fort Larned National Historic Site in the State of Kansas.

summary.text: Increases the amount of appropriations authorized for land acquisition for, and development of, the Fort Larned National Historic Site, Kansas.

titles.title: A bill to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated for development of Fort Larned National Historic Site in the State of Kansas.
